sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-dialog
    v-model="dialogAddStudent"
    max-width="400"
    persistent
  >
    <template v-slot:activator="{ props: activatorProps }">
        <v-btn
         v-bind="activatorProps"
          density="compact"
          icon="mdi-plus"
          size="small"
        />
    </template>
    <v-card
      prepend-icon="mdi-account-school"
      title="Editar Turma"
    >
      <template v-slot:text>
        <v-progress-linear
          v-if="loading"
          color="#008ABD"
          indeterminate
        />
        <v-text-field
          v-model="name"
          label="Nome"
          variant="underlined"
          :disabled="loading"
        />
      </template>
      <template v-slot:actions>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn
          :disabled="loading"
          @click="close"
        >
          Cancela
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn
          :disabled="loading"  
          @click="update"
        >
          Atualizar
        </v-btn>
      </template>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
import api from '@/api/api';

  export default {
    name: 'AddStudent',

    props: {
      schoolCourseId: {
        type: Number,
        default: null
      },
      studentsCurrent: {
        type: Array,
        default: []
      }
    },
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    dialogAddStudent: false,
    students: []
  }),
  computed: {
  },
  watch: {
  },
  async created () {
    await this.listStudents()
  },

  methods: {
    close () {
      this.$emit('close')
    },

    async listStudents () {
      this.loading = true
      try {
        this.students = await api.listStudents()
        this.availableStudents()
        this.loading = false
      } catch (e) {
        this.loading = false
        console.log(e)
      }
    },

    availableStudents () {

    },

    async save () {
      this.loading = true
      const data = {
        school_course_id: this.schoolCourseId,
        stundet_id: this.studentId
      }
      try {
        await api.enrollment(data)
        this.$emit('reload')
        this.loading = false
        this.$emit('close')
      } catch (e) {
        this.loading = false
        console.log(e)
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
